Jump! Yes, every time you jump there is an action and you activate the puzzles,
Get the key and pass the levels by timing the puzzles correctly with good timing!

name: Haunted School: The Presence Behind You
description: Here's an even shorter version, around 150 characters: "Midnight School Terror" Trapped with 7 ghosts. 360° horror forces you to turn. Uncover pasts, make choices. Salt is life. Creepy figures lurk everywhere. Escape or become the 7th spirit?

name: Shifter
description: Explore this strange world using portals to shift between the light and dark dimensions. Navigate the world, transforming it as you progress. Illuminate the void to reveal what has been abandoned in the shadows. And remember, don't linger in the darkness...

name: IsoCraft Story
description: Isocraft Story is an isometric Minecraft-like sandbox game. Shape the infinite and procedurally-generated block world. Collect materials, play online, advance to higher tiers of tools and weapons, go deeper into the world and build a new spaceship to escape from this planet!

name: War Job
description: If there was the war between professions, which side would win? Chef, Cameraman, Police, Singer, Farmer or other professions…?Use silly weapons like a pan or a spade, balloon ,pencil, needle, chicken, buffalo... 20 different job Will create a chaotic surreal physics effects on funny match 5vs5.

name: The Royal Masquerade
description: The Royal Masquerade is the first and only book of The Royal Masquerade series. Chronologically, it is a sequel series to The Crown & The Flame and a prequel series to The Royal Romance and The Royal Heir respectively.

name: Sex In The Block
description: In this exciting game, you explore a luxurious high-rise complex searching for beautiful women to flirt with. Win their hearts with your charm through fun mini-games. As they fall for you, they'll send amazing photos as rewards. Dive into this captivating world and become the ultimate flirt master!

name: Walking Steel

description: One day, the protagonist begins to have strange dreams. He's chased by bizarre dolls, and the cozy attic from his childhood feels unrealistically large. He must navigate between dream and reality to understand why this happens. Always treat Teddy with respect; he loves you and remembers everything.

name: Apprehend

name: Nicktropolis
description:
Nicktropolis was an MMORPG made for Nickelodeon's website in January 30, 2007. It was created to have a world for kids with safe chat features.

Nicktropolis was a social MMO where you could create an avatar and customize it, chat with other players, create your own room, and play games.

The game would allow you to walk around various Nickelodeon themed environments, where you would play mini-games of whatever intellectual property you would be in at the time. By doing so, you would obtain Nickpoints; the in-game currency. With it, you could buy items for your avatar in Nickname Lane where there would also be shops themed around the various shows.

In 2010, it was completely re-branded to The Club, which used a few different assets, but the idea was the same. In 2013, The Club was closed with a few assets remaining. And in 2016, all remaining assets carried over were closed when Nickelodeon removed the option to join as a user on the website.

name: Beatmania Append 4thMix: The Beat Goes On
description:
Beatmania Append 4thMix: The Beat Goes On was released by KCEJ on September 9th, 1999. This is is the countpart version of the arcade game beatmania 4thMIX.

It has a total of 30 songs, 23 from beatmania 4thMIX and 7 from 3rdMIX and completeMIX.

Since this is an Append release, it needs another beatmania title to act as a key disc to boot the game.

First beatmania APPEND game that uses its own independent memory card slot for save data. Previous beatmania APPEND games, as well as all BONUS EDIT games, use the same memory card slot as beatmania CS / beatmania APPEND YebisuMIX; only one of the aforementioned games can share that slot.

In the ranked game mode, all players face the same set of 15 questions in the exact same order. This ensures a fair and consistent challenge, allowing players to truly test their knowledge and compete on an even playing field.

The result is a veritable 21st-century Remembrance of Things Past, an exploration of the state of memory in our digital era. With it, Marker has both invented a literary form and perfected it.

Defend the Eternal Flame: Experience the thrill of defending the flame from hordes of dark forces that besiege it! Feel the exhilaration as you clear stages, with each victory more satisfying than the last.
One-Handed Gameplay: Enjoy easy-to-master controls, designed for one-handed play. Perfect for strategic fun anytime, anywhere.
Customize Your Defense Strategy: Select buffs and strategically place towers to forge your path of resistance. As you level up and choose your growth buffs, your defense becomes an impenetrable fortress.

Pixel Retro offline Roguelike Action
imagine yourself as a hero. What would you do?
Great retro game for fans of dynamic arcades
A colorful and nostalgic atmosphere game that combines genres of arcade, platforming and action at the same time. In Metaphysics, you will not find a twisted plot, non-linear gameplay or complex quests, all you need to do is to shoot out evil enemies who constantly attack you from different directions. Get ready to start a fierce battle for valuable bonuses and enjoy the classic gameplay, made in the style of the best old school games.
Fun for every day entertainment
Choose your favorite character and go to the location teeming with opponents and remember that each character is not only distinguished by his charismatic appearance, but also by some features that affect the gameplay. Destroy crowds of enemies with weapons and watch the attack timer! In Metaphysics, you will not have the opportunity to "shoot" without stopping, be tactful and correctly plan a battle with each of the opponents.

My summoner is various monsters ranging from cute squirrels, rabbits to dragon, angels, and ancient gods!

name: Commander Keen: Keen Meets the Meats
description:
The story involves Keen awakening in a prison cell on the planet Grund-Bief after he got a stomachache due to too much fast food during his sister's birthday party. Keen has been snatched by an Abduct-o-Beam of the organization known as McZargalds, MZ for short, which is led by the Mad Butcher, serves tenderized children and has lax hygiene standards. Not only that, the food on Grund-Bief is so putrid that it has gained sentience.

The protagonist is initially unarmed, but soon finds a weapon called Ultra-Spicy Arcturian Megameatballs that allows him to reduce enemies to piles of ashes. However, to defeat the Mad Butcher, he has to obtain an even more powerful weapon, namely thousand-year old Bloog Eggs. Keen must explore Grund-Bief to find the necessary Bloog Eggs so that he can confront the Mad Butcher and rewire the Abduct-O-Beam to save the Earth once again.

name: Grauen no Torikago: Kapitel 1 - Keiyaku
description:
Grauen no Torikago: Kapitel 1 - Keiyaku is the first chapter of a horror movie sold exclusively through the Dreamcast Direct online service. The film is divided into 365 episodes, each lasting one minute. It was impossible to watch all the episodes at once as they opened gradually. From 1 October 1999 to 1 October 2000, it was necessary to connect Dreamcast to the internet daily and download special save files on the VMU that opened new episodes.

The servers went offline shortly after the final episode unlocked. Now it is necessary to use a special VMU save or directly extract the videos of the GDI disc image to watch the film. The sequels of Grauen no Torikago were only available to consumers who had finished previous chapters, making later entries exceedingly rare.

As of July 2024, a restoration patch has been made by Derek Pascarella that allows you to watch the videos without the vmu save.

name: Persona 3 Portable: Kotone Cutscenes Project - Steam Version
description: The Kotone Cutscenes Project implements reanimated versions of every cutscene from the original PS2 release of Persona 3 to match the Female protagonist route of Persona 3 Portable. description: This is a local two-player tank battle game where two players control blue and red tanks; Players will use a limited number of bullets to eject and defeat enemies in the scenario!

description: Gorodki is a folk sport. Similar in concept to bowling and also somewhat to horseshoes, the aim of the game is to knock out groups of skittles arranged in various patterns by throwing a bat at them.

name: Ventreville: A Cure for Sorrow
description: Determine the fate of Ventreville, a city plagued by sickness and secrets. Play as six protagonists with unique abilities as you interrogate and outwit suspects, hide from enemies, crack puzzles, and even call the Gods for help! What are you willing to risk to find the truth?

The more friends you successfully invite, the more rewards you and your friends will receive.

Spread joy all over the world through the magic of food and fill the world in a vibrant purple happiness.
You, as the chef, are about to go on a journey to learn new skills while making friends all across the world.

Defeat hordes of fast-moving enemies to generate energy for the circus. Collect Schismo's lost Stamps to change your playstyle and raise the skill ceiling. Meta-progression comes in the form of Marlbes that offer mutually exclusive choices.

description: The Kotone Cutscenes Project implements reanimated versions of every cutscene from the original PS2 release of Persona 3 to match the Female protagonist route of Persona 3 Portable. name: Lost in the Dark Woods
description:
In the dense, shadowy forest, the crackling fire is your only defense. The flames flicker and dance, casting long shadows that keep the predators at bay. But the fire is weakening. The night is alive with sounds—rustling leaves, distant growls—reminders that danger lurks just beyond the light.

You must gather wood quickly, feeding the flames to keep them strong. Every piece of wood you find is a lifeline, each spark a promise of safety. The fire is your shield, your beacon of hope in the dark wilderness.

If the fire dies, the predators will close in, their eyes glowing in the darkness, and the forest will consume you. You have no choice—keep the fire burning, or face the terror that waits in the night.

name: Dark Wraith
description: Dark Wraith is a first-person grid-based dungeon crawler game, similar to Wizardry or The Bard's Tale. The main character is Zion, a magic user that finds out that a friendly town-person's daughter has been kidnapped by the Dark Wraith as part of a periodic ritual sacrifice. Up to four other characters can accompany Zion as he searches various dungeons in search of the Dark Wraith. As with many Japanese dungeon crawlers, characters are not created by the player. Rather, they are met throughout the story. However, upon leveling up, the player gets to assign points to various skills and attributes. The game features turn-based combat with enemies appearing within the dungeon, similar to Might and Magic games.

name: Dragon Quest Fushigi no Dungeon MOBILE
description: It is a mobile phone app game, and versions were distributed for i-mode, EZweb, and Yahoo! Mobile. Like Dragon Quest: Young Yangus to Fushigi no Dungeon, the protagonist is Yangus as a young boy, but the content is completely different.

description:
Space Exploration is an overhaul mod for Factorio that continues player's journey after launching the rocket. Expand your factory into space and manage interplanetary logistics. Travel around the solar system in buildable ships and reach light speed to beat the game.

The Space Exploration mod predates the Space Age DLC and both are being developed by the same individual, so they will have similar elements. Space Exploration is meant for players looking for a lengthy, expert challenge.

description:

Get ready for an extremely epic fun race challenge in which the huge stuntman guys are falling simulator. Compete with others and get the real parkour experience. Jump from wall to wall, climb ropes, slide to get faster, flip to jump higher , grab to swing, use ultimate challenging skills to not fall.

Never stop running! Run and run by escaping all the obstacles otherwise you will lose the guys are falling run challenge. There are dozens of maps and all require different set of skills.Increase your ranking by beating your opponents.You can also customize your character; skin, clothing & many more!

A new guys knockout 3d adventure is here.True guys are falling parkour experience is waiting for you !Complete all the parkours with lots of different obstacles and experience breathtaking challenges.Take risks to be first. Explore the different world of amazing legendary run race also has epic challenging levels in which you need to change the way you play and get rewards in this legendary stuntman extreme run.

Now play & take challenge and run as long as you can survive!

Play as a boy trapped between waking life and a dream, exploring his memories each day. Each day reveals a new part of his life, from school and family to love and loss. Your choices will determine if he finds hope and wakes up or falls into darkness. Experience unique environments, calming music, and an emotional story in this immersive adventure.

name: Bound Ball Animals
description: "Bound Ball Animals" is a fee-to-play puzzle action game that combines strategic gameplay with adorable animal-themed puzzles, where you pull and launch balls, bouncing them off walls to hit targets.

name: Super Mario 64: Royal Legacy - Definitive Edition
description:
Super Mario 64: Royal Legacy - Definitive Edition is a rom hack for Super Mario 64 made by aglab2, Nobbie and StunningCactus, and it is a remake of the original SM64 Royal Legacy made by StunningCactus.

It is made for fans of SM64 Sapphire who have already mastered everything the Vanilla game has to offer.

The Game includes 4 original worlds, a new hub world, a new Bowser Stage and original music.

name: OpenGuessr
description: OpenGuessr is a free quiz game utilizing Google Streetview. Moreover, it features a variety of maps and modes as well as multiplayer functionality.

Team up with new bandmates to blow away those pesky aliens in the "Gal Metal" Encore Pack!
This DLC adds five new story episodes, characters, and songs to the lighthearted world of "Gal Metal," as five newcomers join the hard-rocking school metal band K.M.G. (Kichijoji Metal Girls).
Players can swap out the original band members with these new characters for live performances.
Take on the unrelenting Octoids and keep the earth safe with your new friends!

Riley has spent roughly a month living among the Monsters of Snowdown, when one day a fateful encounter forces them to step out of the comfort of the small life they've built and begin a journey to New Home.

Using various trinkets, PLAYs, and your wits, you'll embark on a journey and confront monsters and puzzles along the way, and choose how you'll advance through the Underground. How will your Bravery manifest?

Let's escape from the room!

name: White Knight Chronicles II
description: White Knight Chronicles II, the sequel to White Knight Chronicles: International Edition, is an epic role-playing game available exclusively on the PlayStation 3 computer entertainment system. The game masterfully blends the cinematic storytelling of a single player role-playing game (RPG) with an entertaining and interactive co-op multiplayer RPG experience. From famed Japanese developer LEVEL-5, White Knight Chronicles II, features stunning graphics, over 400 new weapons and armors, and new skills and spells that make battles more interactive, strategic, and fast-paced. In addition to the full sequel, the game also includes the remastered White Knight Chronicles: International Edition as a bonus, delivering two full games and over 100 hours of combined gameplay.

Once upon a time, all 3 worlds were ruled by God. after the war between The angels are led by 'Lucifer' the anti-God. Defeated and expelled, but then one day he disappeared, no one knew where he was. and gave the mission to Luciel for some reason.

Because of a sudden noise from behind her when she turned around, she discovered that a ghost had broken into the house, and Mikae hurried to hide, she began to feel anxious and afraid Then Mikae So find a way to get out of this house.

The young has no choice, but to move to the new city to fulfill his dream

Or not?

Their mission is to survive as long as possible or venture down to the first floor to uncover the mysterious events happening in the building. Each character has unique abilities, allowing them to solve puzzles and complete missions. If all four characters die, the game is over.

An interactive RPG game that you is someone who struck in the dream place, find the way to exit, true or lie this is no fault, it only meet the end.

As you are fired from the job, to save yourself from a collapsing dream, it’s time to investigate, discover the black company’s secrets, and take sweet revenge for the money you deserve.

name: Jigoku Train
description:
Waking up to an unfamiliar place, what course of action will you choose?

Play as Ling, your average office worker having her usual shifts and living her usual life, woke up on the train one night, finding that she was not going to head to her usual destinations.

Not only that, you will also play another character! He wakes up with no memories on a train heading towards an unknown location. Grant is your average amnesiac guy.

Where are they heading, and what can they do in order to head back home? Or is there even any way home?

Picking up right after the events of Realm of Lament, this installment introduces Eddy Ruina, Feedra's wife and a lieutenant in Measuryville. Alerted by Penelope's email regarding Thomas's disappearance, Eddy joins the search. Their investigation leads them back to the events of Carnival, where they uncover the existence of the Soul Realm Gate, a potential path to Thomas. But is it truly that simple?

Start your road trip through the zombie apocalypse! Fight your way through, gain experience and collect items to assemble an epic inventory.

Craft more effective weapons and find out what items you can combine to withstand the ever-increasing waves of zombies.

name: Chicken Strike: Cluck Ops
description:
In a world where chickens have had enough of being served up on platters, one fearless fowl rises to lead the resistance against the fast-food giant known as FCK. Welcome to "Chicken Strike: Cluck Ops", the action-packed adventure where feathers fly and the claws come out!

Take control of a courageous chicken armed to the beak with an arsenal of weapons, from egg launchers to poultry-powered rockets. Embark on an epic quest through a variety of vibrant environments, from bustling city streets to the heart of the FCK empire. Prepare for intense battles against waves of crispy adversaries, including Major Fanders.

Join the resistance, cluck up your courage, and embark on an egg-citing adventure to save chicken-kind from the clutches of the fast-food industry. It's time to show FCK who is the boss!

description: When giant monsters fight, no one’s safe. Embark on a thrilling quest of survival in a city that’s become a battleground for Titans. name: Fever Golf
description: This is a game about early 2000s bargain bin CD culture, that is, games that few people played & fewer remember. They were the last few digital artifacts that were allowed to fall into the quiet oblivion of history—the rear guard of an older era that pre-existed our current climate of perpetual distribution. This is a game for the MySimAquariam and MoonTycoons of the world; bottom-shelf junk-ware with a soul.

description: A game for kids following "Lefty" and "Righty" as they attempt to get back the letters than Victor the Virus stole. The game teaches kids how to read and type.

Love the game is a semi-autoclicker unlockable type of game!
For every space button pressed over a passing civilian, your love meter increases. hit target goals to unlock wacky costumes and bonuses to help increase your love points.

name: Hard Nut to Crack
description: Blast through 32 chaotic levels to rockin' MIDIs from 'round the net! These short but weird levels, inspired by powerful mappers like Sandy Petersen, Stanley Stasiak (Castle of Evil), and Greytale (DARKHELL.WAD), include a wide variety of challenges and themes.

name: Into Sandy's Cities
description:
Welcome to "Into Sandy's Cities". This MegaWAD shows what Doom 2 from an alternate universe might look like, with all 32 maps being made in the style of Sandy Petersen's original levels. And not just visually! Layouts, gimmicks, enemy placements, even all bugs, glitches, limitations and other quirks have been faithfully recreated.

This WAD doesn't distinguish between "good" or "bad", it just aims to recreate the original experience as accurately as possible, warts and all. It's a celebration of Doom 2, and a love letter to Petersen's design philosophy in particular.
